thread.title: ELIZABETH DECAUL

author: ELIZABETH DECAUL
title: ELIZABETH DECAUL
text: I ordered flowers for my daughter in law on the birth of my granddaughter. I upgraded to a larger bunch as I wanted them to be special. The web site stated that they would arrive in bud. I was at the house when they arrived & they were open. The next day they had started to brown & the third day they were drooping. Today they are not looking good at all. I am very disappointed with my order.
